message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $170. I think it's a great deal for something of this quality.
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. I'm willing to make a deal at that price.
I understand your position, Bob, but $90 is quite a bit lower than what I had in mind.  How about we meet halfway and settle on $130?
I appreciate your willingness to meet halfway, but I'm still a bit hesitant to pay $130. How about we try $110?
Bob, I appreciate you working with me on this. To be honest, $120 is the absolute lowest I can go. It's a very competitive price for a product of this quality.
I appreciate your honesty, but I'm afraid I'm not willing to go above $100. I'm willing to make a deal at this price, but no higher.
